Initial Data Setup
```{r}

##Change Path of data
jobs <- read.csv('/Users/aedanwen/Downloads/jobs.csv')
jobs$treat <- as.factor(jobs$treat)
jobs$control <- NULL
jobs$X <- NULL
set.seed(18271398)
ind <- sample(1:nrow(jobs), 200)
test <- jobs[ind,]
train <- jobs[-ind,]
```

```{r}


```
```{r}
library(tree)
library(caret)
tree.jobs <- tree(treat~., data = train)
plot(tree.jobs)
text(tree.jobs)
preds <- predict(tree.jobs,test,type='class')
confusionMatrix(preds,test$treat)
```
```{r}
library(gclus)
lda.jobs <- lda(treat~.,train)
preds <- predict(lda.jobs,test)
confusionMatrix(preds,test$treat,preds)

```
